divs: Sighting Detailsfriends house, on his roof looking at sky and talking. one of my friends pointed out something in the sky. i immidiately thought it was a space ship, it didnt look like anything i have seen before. it was moving about as slow as an airplane, it made no noise, it was really high up, when it moved, it was diagonal. looked as if it had a few lights and it was really big. my heart started beating really hard and my adrenaline rose. my friends and i were scrambling for our cell phones to take a picture, i dont think it would have worked any ways because it was too faint. but we were watching it and it finally started to fade away.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around April 29th 2006
Summary: long rectangle with barely visable lights
